description:
This is a Poll description.
It can be long.
And multi-line
intro:
Welcome! This is an intro text to a Poll!
It can be long.
And multi-line.
outro:
This is an outro of the poll.
It can be multiline too
endScoreMessage:
Congratulations!
This is an example of a poll end message with scores. 
The Poll can also be set to not to count the points with an isScoredPoll flag in the CMS.
